column4: seems gtkspell in general is not working ... I just switched my locale to es so maybe that has something to do with it?
hoary? utf-8?
yes, hoary ... but ISO-8859-1, which was what was being used for en before
and you didn't switch to utf-8 at all?
no, not that I'm aware of
you could try ispell? (whatever you do don't switch to utf-8.. and yeah devs you may strangle me)
don't most apps hardcode which spell lib they use?
no..
I know Tomboy does ...
don't know anything about Tomboy.. but I use ispell myself.. works fab
is there a systemwide change?
or is configured within each app?
yeah I think so.. just go into preferences
yo
which ones? :) my life's full of em
let's stick with ubu.. my office hours as head doctor are over
never doing anything the easy way huh? :P
true true :)
is gnomebaker any good?
I think so... I like it
is it written in c?
you wanted a challenge... :P
ugh I don't need any more, trust me :)
and here I am thinking I just made your day :)
